categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors

nodes.text: Nicolas Anastassiou (born August 11, 1971) is a visual effects editor at Industrial Light & Magic. He was part of the crews that worked on the films Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. Anastassiou also had a cameo role in Attack of the Clones as the Jedi Knight Nicanas Tassu. He later worked as an editor for the TV series Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
